t: A $4 billion clothing company created an exclusive brand for Amazon Prime | Vox
s: July 9, 2017 - In the latest signal that Amazon is being taken seriously as a challenger in apparel to big-box retailers and department stores, the Carter’s company has created a new kids’ clothing brand that it’s selling exclusively to Amazon and its Prime members.

t: Carter’s Creates Simple Joys Private Label Brand For Amazon Prime - Retail TouchPoints

t: Carter's - Wikipedia
s: December 23, 2024 - In the early 2000s, Carter's reached an agreement with Target Corporation to create the "Just One You" spin-off clothing line, to be sold exclusively in Target stores. Carter's later created exclusive lines for retailers Walmart and Amazon. All of the brands sell similar articles of clothing, ...

t: Investor overview | Carter’s, Inc.
s: Carter’s is the largest supplier of young children’s apparel to the largest retailers in North America. Its brands are sold in leading department stores, national chains, and specialty retailers domestically and internationally. The Company’s Child of Mine brand is available at Walmart, its Just One You brand is available at Target, and its Simple Joys brand is available on Amazon...
